attributes.action: Apologise to the British Public for ruining Great Britain by resigning as the unelected PM...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After 12 years in the driving seat of the British economy,seeing it go through a period of false growth, being
underpinned by borrowing, into a spiral of decline, We the British Public deserve a change in fortune. Due to these false foundations, it is now time for Gordon to acknowledge that he  alone, amongst all the current leaders of the Gobal(Western)Economy, has been at the forefront of creating the decline of the Banks,the increased dedt of our country and the service industry economy for Britain. Based on these facts alone, Gordon "the unelected PM" for Britain must stand down,   immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
